Post._content:
`ADB`  `Android Debug BridgeAndroid`  `Android`  `ADB`  `ADB`  ADB 

<!-- more -->

ADB ok


## 

- `adb version` -- 

```sh
$ adb version

Android Debug Bridge version 1.0.36
Revision 8f855a3d9b35-android
```

- `adb [-d|-e|-s <serialNumber>] <command>` -- adb 
/

|                   |                                                    |
| :-------------------: | :----------------------------------------------------: |
| -d                    |  USB  Android      |
| -e                    |                      |
| -s <serialNumber>     |  serialNumber /        |

/ -s <serialNumber> serialNumber  adb devices 

```sh
$ adb devices

List of devices attached
cf264b8f    device
emulator-5554   device

#cf264b8f  emulator-5554  serialNumber cf264b8f  adb 

adb -s cf264b8f shell wm size
```

/

- `adb start-server/adb kill-server`-- / Server

 `adb server` 

- `adb -P <port> start-server` --  adb server 

## 

- `adb devices` -- 

```sh
eg:
adb devices

#USB:
List of devices attached
02ae0c1021089daf       device

#IP:(,5555)
List of devices attached
192.168.123.104:5555    device
```

- `adb connect <device-ip-address>` --  IP 

```sh
eg:
adb connect 192.168.123.104
#:
connected to 192.168.123.104:5555
```

- `adb disconnect <device-ip-address>` -- 

## 

- `adb install [-l\-r\-s\-d] <path_to_apk>` -- 

|      |                                |
| :------: | :--------------------------------: |
| -l       |  /mnt/asec     |
| -r       |            |
| -s       |  sdcard                |
| -d       |                    |

```sh
eg:
    adb install
    adb install /Users/storm/temp/demo.apk
    adb install -r demo.apk
    adb install -s demo.apk

#
[100%] /data/local/tmp/1.apk
    pkg: /data/local/tmp/1.apk
Success

#
[100%] /data/local/tmp/map-20160831.apk
        pkg: /data/local/tmp/map-20160831.apk
Failure [INSTALL_FAILED_ALREADY_EXISTS]

#adb install 

#adb install 

#push apk  /data/local/tmp

# pm install 

# /data/local/tmp  apk 

#
```

- `adb uninstall [-k] <packagename>` -- 

<packagename> -k 

```sh
eg
adb uninstall com.qihoo360.mobilesafe
# 360 
```

- `adb shell pm clear <packagename>` -- 

<packagename> 

```sh
eg:
adb shell pm clear com.qihoo360.mobilesafe
# 360 
```

- `adb shell pm list packages [-f/-d/-e/-s/-3/-i/-u] [FILTER]` -- 

|          |                      |
| :----------: | :--------------------------: |
|            |                      |
| -f           |  apk       |
| -d           |  disabled        |
| -e           |  enabled         |
| -s           |                |
| -3           |              |
| [FILTER>]   |  <FILTER>      |

```sh
eg:
    #
    adb shell pm list packages -s

    #
    adb shell pm list packages -3

    #
    adb shell pm list packages mazhuang

    # grep 
    adb shell pm list packages | grep mazhuang
```

- `adb shell am force-stop <packagename>` -- 

```sh
eg:
adb shell am force-stop com.qihoo360.mobilesafe
# 360 
```

## 

- `adb pull <> []` -- 
 `` 
- `adb push <> <>` -- 

## /

- `adb shell input keyevent <keycode>` -- /

| keycode     |                                |
| :---------: | :--------------------------------: |
| 3           | HOME                             |
| 4           |                              |
| 5           |                        |
| 6           |                            |
| 24          |                            |
| 25          |                            |
| 26          |                              |

| 64          |                          |

| 122         |            |
| 123         |            |
| 126         |                            |
| 127         |                            |
| 164         |                                |
| 176         |                        |

| 207         |                          |
| 208         |                            |
| 209         |                            |
| 210         |                          |
| 220         |                        |
| 221         |                        |
| 223         |                            |
| 224         |                            |
| 231         |                        |
| 276         |  wakelock      |


```sh
eg:
#
adb shell input keyevent 26

#
adb shell input keyevent 82

#HOME 
adb shell input keyevent 3

#
adb shell input keyevent 4

#//
adb shell input keyevent 24/25/164

#( 300 1000 300 500 x y x y)
adb shell input swipe 300 1000 300 500

# input 
adb shell input text hello

    tween = v0 t - a t t / 2
    ==> tween = 2     ( target - location ) time / duration
    - (target - location )     time time / ( duration duration )

## mongodb
    mongodb `https://www.mongodb.com/download-center#community` ,

- `Windows` , 
    + `Windows`.
```sh
    wmic os get caption
    wmic os get osarchitecture
```

- `Linux` :
    +  `sudo apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv 0C49F3730359A14518585931BC711F9BA15703C6`
    + MongoDB:
        * `Ubuntu 12.04` : `echo "deb [ arch=amd64 ] http://repo.mongodb.org/apt/ubuntu precise/mongodb-org/3.4 multiverse" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb-org-3.4.list`
        * `Ubuntu 14.04` : `echo "deb [ arch=amd64 ] http://repo.mongodb.org/apt/ubuntu trusty/mongodb-org/3.4 multiverse" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb-org-3.4.list`
        * `Ubuntu 16.04` : `echo "deb [ arch=amd64,arm64 ] http://repo.mongodb.org/apt/ubuntu xenial/mongodb-org/3.4 multiverse" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb-org-3.4.list`
    +  `sudo apt-get update`
    + `MongoDB` `sudo apt-get install -y mongodb-org`

- `OS X` 
    +  `curl -O https://fastdl.mongodb.org/osx/mongodb-osx-x86_64-3.4.2.tgz`
    +  `tar -zxvf mongodb-osx-x86_64-3.4.2.tgz`
    +  `mkdir -p mongodb && cp -R -n mongodb-osx-x86_64-3.4.2 / mongodb`
    + `shell` `rc``~/.bashrc` `export  PATH = <mongodb-install-directory> / bin$ PATH`

## 

 - (`D`) `mkdir -p /Server-related/DB`
 - (`mongodb`) `mongod --dbpath=D:\Server-related\DB`

- `mongodb` `mongo.exe`

## shadowsocks

- vi /etc/shadowsocks.json

```json
//
{
    "server":"0.0.0.0",// ip (IPv4/IPv6)
    "server_port":1121,//,
    "local_address":"127.0.0.1",//
    "local_port":1080,
    "password":"password",//
    "timeout":300,//
    "method":"aes-256-cfb",//
    "fast_open":false
}

//
{
    "server":"0.0.0.0",
    "port_password": {
        "1121": "password",
        "1122" : "password"
    },
    "timeout":300,
    "method":"aes-256-cfb",
    "fast_open": false
}
```

## shadowsocks

- ssserver -c /etc/shadowsocks.json -d start

## 

- ssserver -d stop

## 

- /var/log/shadowsocks.log

## 

- ssserver -h

    /etc/shadowsocks.json"server"="0.0.0.0". `,`
